short_summary: The Canadian Space Agency is seeking a general contractor to carry out the redevelopment of area 6C-104 at the John H. Chapman Centre in Longueuil, Quebec
description: The project involves the redevelopment of the 6C-104 area at the John H. Chapman Centre located in Longueuil, Quebec. The general contractor will be responsible for carrying out the project as detailed in the annexes.

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Information

* **Title**: Redevelopment of Area 6C-104 - John H. Chapman Centre
* **Reference Number**: WS3895212958
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3895212958
* **Tender Closes**: April 20, 2023 at 14:00 ET ( expired )

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS) of Canada, acting on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to engage the services of a general contractor for the redevelopment of 6C-104 at the John H. Chapman Centre in Longueuil, Quebec.

### Terms and Conditions

* **Bid Submission**: All bids must be submitted by 2 PM EDT on April 6, 2023 ( expired )
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Business Category**: Construction Services
* **Location of Work**: John H. Chapman Centre, Longueuil, Quebec
* **Contract Term**: 

### Key Details

* **Contact Information**: Jessica Cossette Fontaine, jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Languages of Work**: French and English
* **Access to Locations**: Access to the tender information is available on the website: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15619961?extsite=MTU2MTk5NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Requirements

* The contractor must hold a Quebec permit and a valid business license during the execution of the contract.
* The contractor must be able to provide the required supporting documentation.

### Additional Resources

The complete RFP document can be accessed by following the link above. Detailed information regarding this tender opportunity is also available in the above referenced attachment.
